validation.validate_nested: each value in nested property '{{field}}' must be either object or array
validation.is_date_string: '{{field}}' must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
validation.is_date_only_string: '{{field}}' must be a valid date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
validation.is_enum: '{{field}}' must be a valid enum value
validation.is_number: '{{field}}' must be a number conforming to the specified constraints
validation.is_decimal: '{{field}}' is not a valid decimal number
validation.is_in: '{{field}}' must be one of the following values: {{values}}
validation.is_latitude: '{{field}}' must be a latitude string or number
validation.is_longitude: '{{field}}' must be a longitude string or number
validation.is_lat_long: '{{field}}' must be a latitude, longitude string
validation.is_phone_number: '{{field}}' must be a valid phone number
validation.array_max_size: '{{field}}' must contain not more than {{max}} elements
validation.length: '{{field}}' must be longer than or equal to {{min}} and shorter than or equal to {{max}} characters
validation.min_length: '{{field}}' must be longer than or equal to {{min}} characters
validation.max_length: '{{field}}' must be shorter than or equal to {{max}} characters
validation.is_past_date: '{{field}}' must be a day in the past
validation.is_future_date: '{{field}}' must be a day in the future

message.invalid_data_check_fields_property_for_m: invalid data, check 'fields' property for more info
message.format_of_%s_is_invalid_or_not_supported: format of %s is invalid or not supported, following formats are supported: %s
message.%s_number_field_must_be_at_least_%s_and_: %s number field must be at least %s and a maximum of %s
message.size_of_%s_must_be_a_maximum_of_%s_%s: size of %s must be a maximum of %s (%s)
message.length_of_%s_must_be_at_least_%s: length of %s must be at least %s
message.length_of_%s_must_be_at_least_%s_and_max: length of %s must be at least %s and maximum %s
length of %s must be at least %s and maximum %s with one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit and one special character
message.length_of_%s_must_be_a_maximum_of_%s: length of %s must be a maximum of %s
message.length_of_%s_must_be_less_than_or_equal_: length of %s must be less than or equal to %s
message.length_of_%s_must_be_greater_than_or_equ: length of %s must be greater than or equal to %s
message.length_of_%s_must_be_between_%s_and_%s: length of %s must be between %s and %s

account_activation.subject: Account activation
account_activation.intro: Welcome to {{projectName}}! We're very excited to have you on board.
account_activation.instructions: To get started with {{projectName}}, please click here:
account_activation.outro: Need help, or have questions? Just reply to this email, we'd love to help.

reset_password.subject: Reset your password
reset_password.intro: You have received this email because a password reset request for your account was received.
reset_password.instructions: Click the button below to reset your password:
reset_password.outro: If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required on your part.
